src:
Pobeda Kecmanovića na startu NextGen ATP finala
05 Nov 2019, 15:49 by Zile
Miomir Kecmanović je ostvario prvu pobedu na NextGen ATP finalu u Milanu.
Turnir se igra po drugačijim pravilima, na tri dobijena seta i četiri dobijena gema u setu, uz taj-brejk pri rezultatu 3:3, a Kecmanović je u 1. kolu savladao Kaspera Ruda sa 2:1, po setovima 4:3(5), 4:3(5), 4:2.
Srpski teniser će u 2. kolu igrati protiv Aleksa De Minora, dok je za kraj ostavljen duel sa Alehandrom Davidovič-Fokinom.
U grupi B nalaze se Ugo Umber, Mikael Imer, Frensis Tiafo i Janik Siner.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Kecmanovic wins at the start of the NextGen ATP Finals
05 Nov 2019, 15:49 by Zile
Miomir Kecmanovic achieved his first victory at the NextGen ATP final in Milan.
The tournament is played by different rules, on three sets won and four games won in sets, with a tiebreaker at 3: 3, and Kecmanovic defeated Kasper Rud in the 1st round with 2: 1, 4: 3 sets (5 ), 4: 3 (5), 4: 2.
The Serbian tennis player will play against Alex De Minor in Round 2, while the duel with Alejandro Davidovich-Fokin is left behind.
Group B includes Ugo Umber, Mikael Imer, Frensis Tiafo and Janik Siner.
